name: EBONY WOOD EDP 100ML (3.4 FL.OZ).
description:
Created by Jo Malone CBE, founder of Jo Loves.

Eau de Parfum. A woody fragrance with notes of grapefruit, cypress and pink peppercorn, which melts into a heart of coffee. Its base of patchouli and vetiver provides a warm and elegant touch.
notes: Composition: ALCOHOL DENAT., FRAGRANCE (PARFUM), WATER (AQUA), LIMONENE, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, EUGENOL...

name: WONDER ROSE CRUSH EDP 90 ML / 3.04 OZ
description: Eau de Parfum. A bolder, more luminous version of Wonder Rose. Juicy and vibrant, it blends pear and blood orange with the radiant energy of the modern rose. Creamy vanilla signs the composition, leaving a warm, addictive trail that captures the effervescent thrill of a fleeting crush.
